title: Noam Chomsky On The Russia-Ukraine War.
description:
Noam Chomsky shares his 2023 perspective on the ongoing war between Russia and Ukraine, and where does he think this conflict is heading in the future.

Full interview here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=av_0PhJdw9M

Chomsky's 2022 perspective on the Russia-Ukraine War: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0Z5sNAr8qI&t=1651s

Download the full transcript of the interview: https://throughconversations.ck.page/74977804d7
